creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: landscape; river in foreground; green mountain in middle ground; snow-capped Mt. Fuji in background
inscription: left margin: 昭和八年二月廿日写 {Shōwa hachinen nigatsu hatsuka sha} (transcribed 20 February 1933)
markings: LLC, red round artist\'s seal: 川セ {Kawase}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Originating in the Akaishi and Kantō mountains, the Fuji river flows into Suruga bay.
title: Fuji River
